mapper.select: SELECT si.id,si.`product_code`,p.`product_name`,p.`model` AS product_model,p.`type` AS product_type, p.`product_unit`, si.`amount`,si.`type`,si.`create_time`,si.`update_time` FROM `storage_input` si LEFT JOIN `product_info` p ON p.`product_code` = si.`product_code` where 1=1 and si.`product_code` like CONCAT('%',#{productCode},'%') and si.`type` like CONCAT('%',#{type},'%') and si.`create_time` >= #{startTime} and si.`create_time` <= #{endTime}
